content: It's pretty funny to me. Military.com has had this North Korea board up for a few years now with the sub-heading, "The situation in North Korea is looking bleak. They've kicked out UN monitors, disabled verification equipment, and may have one or two nukes..." ...And it is still just as relevent as it was a few years ago.

title: This board is hilarious!
